name: Cursor

aliases.name: Cursor
aliases.comment: Base type, the triplet of state, signal ans lens
aliases.type: { receiver : Signal.Address a, state : a, lens : Focus.Focus a b }

values.comment: Composition operator, allow to go deeper in state via lens
values.type: Cursor.Cursor a b -> Focus.Focus b c -> Cursor.Cursor a c

values.name: createC
values.comment: Helper to create a Cursor form signal mail box and initia state data
values.type: Signal.Mailbox a -> a -> Cursor.Cursor a a

values.name: drawC
values.type: a -> (Cursor.Cursor a a -> b) -> Signal.Signal b
